extendedInfo.description: Download our free Android application to make the first step towards a healthier you. The Let's Move It! Mobile App makes it easy to move forward on your goal to wellness.Features include:- Local and world-wide mileage challenges to get you moving, along with a built-in pedometer to track your progress.- Videos, wellness tips, and a calorie converter to help keep you healthy - even when you're not walking!- Personalized themes and challenges based on your favorite Cleveland sports teams.- Tracking that allows you to compare yourself to other app users

reviews.title: Unremarkable.
reviews.comment: The pedometer is not very accurate and calorie converter feature is very limited. I am uninstalling it as soon as I finish this review.
reviews.author: Christy Frownfelter

reviews.comment: Pedometer was counting steps while I was holding my phone still sitting on the couch... if only it were that easy to get in shape for real. Uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Froze saving settings
reviews.comment: I installed this app, after trying to set up my account it froze saving my settings. A real shame since the concept of it is really great. I can\'t even uninstall it. I can\'t even rate it since I can\'t use it, but for now I give it one star.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does not count steps most of the time. Locking does not work well. Refused to count any steps until I closed the app. Nexus S. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really sad app. There are much better ones. Expected more frkm the Cleveland Clinc. Only does walking. Why not cycling running with gps integratio
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why??
reviews.comment: Installed it and uninstalled immediately. Can\'t even use the app without creating an account first. I don\'t want CCF to have my email address and why should they need it to use the app? I work at CCF, just another way for big brother to watch.
reviews.author: A Google User
